name: Human and Molecular Genetics
description: Current aspects of human and molecular genetics including: chromosome structure and function, inheritance of mutations and disease, the human genome and disease gene mapping, cancer genetics, mouse disease models and gene based diagnostics and therapies.
prerequisites: BCH311H1/MGY311Y1 (Note: CSB349H1 is acceptable with permission of the instructor)

instructors: N Sondheimer P Awadalla J Dowling C Pearson M Wilson
